<EnumerationListItem name="DCE">

<EnumerationListItem name="SinglePass">
Enables Observer-based DCE and additional heuristics that retry combining defined and used instructions of modified instructions
</EnumerationListItem>

## Public Member Attributes

### EnableFullDCE {#a751f02159e4303b50a4eb7baf1d517fc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::CombinerInfo::EnableFullDCE = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a></>}>
Whether dead code elimination is performed before each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combiner">Combiner</a> iteration.

If Observer-based DCE is enabled, this controls if a full DCE pass is performed before the first <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combiner">Combiner</a> iteration.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/combinerinfo-h/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/combinerinfo-h">CombinerInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### EnableOpt {#ae73b725cabcf87656df214d1eea6fe8d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::CombinerInfo::EnableOpt">
Whether optimizations should be enabled.

This is to distinguish between uses of the combiner unconditionally and only when optimizations are specifically enabled/

### IllegalOpsAllowed {#aab2c3f1607c68901fcd6b8fe9509d0f4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::CombinerInfo::IllegalOpsAllowed">
If <code>IllegalOpsAllowed</code> is false, the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combinerhelper">CombinerHelper</a> will make use of the legalizerInfo to check for legality before each transformation.

### LegalizeIllegalOps {#a965ca618a929b51e7061940f57d75fe4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::CombinerInfo::LegalizeIllegalOps">
If <code>LegalizeIllegalOps</code> is true, the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combiner">Combiner</a> will also legalize the illegal ops that are created.

### MaxIterations {#a19d19bf1d7a82f4d19c7bfe8ac56d9a5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::CombinerInfo::MaxIterations = 0">
The maximum number of times the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combiner">Combiner</a> will iterate over the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>.

Setting this to 0 enables fixed-point iteration.
